author: Rajinder S. Gill
text:
Got A Call From The Owner Of Citizen Gas Enterprises Alaknanda... He Assured Me That This Kind Of Mistake Will Never Ever Occur In Future...

Going By His Words & Trusting On His Assurances, I Thanks To Everyone For Taking The Pain To Resolve My Grievance...

Thanks

author: Rajinder S. Gill
text:
Message That The Cylinder Has Been Delivered... What Kind Of Bullshit Nonsense Is This ???

My Gas Agency Is Citizen Gas Enterprises Alaknanda New Delhi...

Please Get My Ordered Refill Delivered As I Have Already Paid You Online.. Don't Compel Me To Approach @jagograhakjago

author: Rajinder S. Gill
text: Tomorrow I'm Going To Surrender My Axis Bank Credit Card At The Nearest Branch Of Axis Bank Because I Am Deliberately Cheated By The Bank For 700/ In The Name Of Late Payment Charges While The Bank Reversed The Payment Which I Made Well Before The Due Date...

author: Rajinder S. Gill
text:
4 Days Ago I Requested You To Cancel My Axis Bank Credit Card From Your End As I Want To Surrender It Due To Your Ridiculous & Pathetic Cheap Cheating Antics... Why Haven't You Cancelled It Yet...

Either Reverse Back The Late Payment Charges Or Cancel It Immediately...

author: Rajinder S. Gill
text: Nobody Is As Fraud & Thief As You Are.. Please Cancel My Card With Immediate Effect...

author: Rajinder S. Gill
text:
Any Late Payment Charges But Shockingly You Have Charged Me 600/+GST As Late Payment Charges...

Is This The New Way Of Earning Money??? Pathetic!!
I Want To Surrender Your Fucking Credit Card.. Please Cancel It From Your End.. I Have 5 Other Bank Credit Cards But

author: Rajinder S. Gill
text: @AxisBank @AxisBankSupport This Is Absolutely Ridiculous & Rubbish At Your End... As Always I Made The Payment Of My Axis Bank Credit Card Before Due Date But The Payment Was Reversed & I Informed You About This Reversal & Requested You That I Should Not Be Levied

Rajinder S. Gill
text:
Hello @zeptocares @ZeptoNow When Will You Start Delivering At Tughlakabad Extension New Delhi ???

As Per Your Advice I Have Been Sitting Tight Since A Long Time...

author: Rajinder S. Gill
text:
Well Before Due Date... But I Didn't Understand Why The Payment Was Reversed Back... Please Make Sure That I Am Not Levied Any Interest As It's Not My Fault & Payment Was Never Delayed Beyond The Due Date.

@RBI @nsitharaman @FinMinIndia https://t.co/FILu5iFGk0

author: Rajinder S. Gill
text: But Even After More Than 6 Hours, The Subscription Hasn't Been Activated... Have You All Gone Mad At Airtel ????

text: Dear @TwitterIndia @verified Please Verify The Twitter Handle @RoflGandhi_ As Many Parody Accounts Have Started Cropping Up With The Same Name, Which, Many Times Makes The Followers Confused...
